title: FS: T202 McBride/Milan Shoeless Joe Jackson New SGC SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T202 McBride/Milan Shoeless Joe Jackson New SGC SOLD
posts.post_content:
As we all know by now, that is Shoeless Joe in the center panel. Yet, the prices really aren't taking off like you think they would. Now is the time to buy I guess. This one is a really respectable 1.5-check out the scans. The price is SOLD PP/FF delivered. Thanks for looking.

Joe K
